name: Colchicum
Relationship: Antidotes: THUJA; CAMPH.; COCCUL.; NUX; PULS.Compare:COLCHICINE (intestinal catarrh with shreddy membranes; convulsive jerkings of right hand; rheumatic fever, gout, endo and pericarditis, pleurisy, arthritis, deform in early stages; INTENSE PAIN OF RHEUMATISM 3x trit.). Also, CARBO; ARNICA; LILIUM; ARSEN.; VERAT.

Heart: Pericarditis, with severe pain, oppression and dyspnoea, pulse threadlike
Sound of heart becomes weaker, pulse of low tension
Eyes: Lachrymation worse in open air; violent tearing pain in eyes
Stomach: The SMELL OF FOOD CAUSES NAUSEA EVEN TO FAINTING, especially fish
Vomiting of mucus, bile and food; worse, any motion; GREAT COLDNESS IN STOMACH
CRAVING FOR VARIOUS THINGS, but is averse to them when smelling them, seized then with nausea
Dry mouth, tongue burns, gums and teeth pain
Burning or ICY COLDNESS IN STOMACH and abdomen
THIRST; pain in stomach and flatulence
Head: Headache chiefly frontal and temporal, but also occipital and in nape of neck, worse afternoon and evening
Urine: Dark, scanty or suppressed; bloody, brown, black, inky; contains clots of putrid decomposed blood, albumin, sugar
Modalities: Worse: smell of food in evening
Stool: Ineffectual pressing; feels faeces in rectum, but cannot expel them
Autumnal dysentery; stools contain WHITE SHREDDY PARTICLES in large quantities
Painful, scanty, transparent, jelly-like mucus; pain, as if anus were torn open, with prolapse
Back: Aching in lumbar and lumbosacral region
Face: Tingling and oedematous swelling; cheeks red, hot, sweaty
Very irritable with the pains  Pain behind angle of right lower jaw
Pain in facial muscles, moving about
Female: Sensation of swelling in vulva and clitoris
Cold feeling in thigh after period
Skin: Pink spots on back, chest and abdomen
Abdomen: Caecum and ascending colon much distended
DISTENTION of abdomen, with gas, inability to stretch out legs
Extremities: Knees strike together, can hardly walk
Pins and needles in hands and wrists, fingertips numb
Inflammation of great toe, gout in heel, CANNOT BEAR TO HAVE IT TOUCHED OR MOVED
Tearing in limbs during warm weather, stinging during cold
Joints stiff and feverish; shifting rheumatism; pains worse at night
Oedematous swelling and coldness of legs and feet
Pain worse in evening and warm weather
Ears: Itching in ears; sharp, shooting pains below right tragus

details: Affects markedly the muscular tissues, periosteum, and synovial membranes of joints. Has specific power of relieving the gouty paroxysms. It seems to be more beneficial in chronic affections of these parts. The parts are red, hot, swollen. Tearing pains; worse, in the evening and at night and from touch; stubbing the toes hurts exceedingly. THERE IS ALWAYS GREAT PROSTRATION, internal COLDNESS, and tendency to collapse. Effects of night watching and hard study. Shocks as from electricity through one half of body. Bad effects from suppressed sweat. Dreams of mice.
